about_the_game:
World Diplomat is your gateway to a world of diplomacy where every choice matters.

Step into the shoes of a world diplomat, select your diplomat name and firm, and embark on a journey to make a meaningful change in the world.

"It's your time to shape the future, change the world."


Game Features

180 Cultures: Explore diverse cultures from around the world, understand others better, and learn to accept differences.

60 Languages: Learn new languages and improve your communication with leading figures.

29 Diplomat Skills: Master various diplomatic skills to succeed in missions.

15 Technologies: Leverage diplomat advanced technologies to gain an edge.

25 Futuristic Developments: Implement innovative futuristic developments by your firm.

59 Mission Types: Engage in diverse missions that impact country relations, economies, security, and happiness.

11 Conference Types: Meet high-level attendees and complete unique missions to earn rewards.


Game Highlights

Generative AI: Harness the power of AI to simulate actions and decisions to make the world a better place.

Mission Rewards: Earn money, titles, influence, and opportunities to enhance countries' stability and prosperity.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make will lead to unique outcomes.

Join the global stage and navigate the complexities of diplomatic relations.

Connect with world leaders and make a lasting impact.

Could you be the one to win the Nobel Peace Prize?

World Diplomat offers unlimited options and possibilities.

Will you be the one to lead the world towards a brighter future?


Accessibility

VoiceOver users can enable accessibility mode by tapping three times with three fingers upon launching the game.

Play with swipes and double-taps. (Please ensure TalkBack or any voice-over programs are closed before starting the game).

In case you play on the PC on the main screen, click A or F1 on keyboard to turn ON or OFF Audio Description


Starting a new game

To start a new game, enter the diplomat's name and gender, firm name, country of origin, game difficulty, and primary skill.

Once the game begins, you'll see the main screen with the game goals and how to win or lose.

The primary objective is to bring the world to a state of utopia.

Achieving utopia means creating a world without wars and with the highest levels of global economy, security, and happiness.


Game loss conditions

You can lose the game if many wars break out, if you exceed the age limit, or if you lose all your money.


Game speed

Select your game speed and start playing. You can pause, speed up, or slow down the game at any time.


Traveling, conferences and meetings

Click on travel to enter conferences, meetings, and travel to other countries.

To attend a conference, buy a ticket and check the attend conferences screen for the conference schedule and location.

Once the conference starts, game time will pause.

The artificial intelligence will generate a new storyline each time, detailing who you meet and where they are from.


Building connections

At conferences, meet important people and build your network of connections.

Receive missions and complete them. If the mission is in another country, travel there and obtain a visa.

Visa requirements are based on real-world relations and data.

Check the security risk for your diplomat to avoid harm or kidnapping.


Preparing for meetings

When traveling for a meeting, prepare by activating technologies that give you bonuses.

During the meeting, select options and let the AI build your storyline.


Completing missions

After completing a mission and signing an agreement, access AI-generated speeches and crucial plans.

Earn rewards like money, experience and titles.

Increase your influence with the contact person to request more missions or connections.

We wish you good luck in uniting the world under your leadership.

Your support is vital for our continued development.

We plan to add countless new options, scenarios, missions, technologies, and more. Your support is important to us to continue developing.

Thank you,

From iGindis Team

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 11+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 11+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

World Diplomat - Game-play Introduction - Research and Technology

World Diplomat - Game-play Introduction - Network Of Connections
World Diplomat - Game-play Introduction - Building Your Firm
World Diplomat - Game-play Introduction - World Events and News
World Diplomat - Simulate AI call with any person in the world (new)

name: World Diplomat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Core (1.7GHz and above)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Core (2.0GHz and above)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card

short_description: Embark on a diplomatic journey to impact the world with skills and strategy.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech*, Dutch*, Greek*, Indonesian*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Hebrew*, Malay*, Persian*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Croatian*
*languages with full audio support
